duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing full cycle accounting, costing/controlling, and/or full cycle reporting for the assigned business segment.
Overseeing the preparation of balance sheet account reconciliations, accrual management, profit and loss analytics, and financial statement reporting.
Participating in the monthly, quarterly, and annual close process, ensuring timely and accurate completion of assigned tasks.
Assisting with schedules, workpapers managed in Prosystems, and completing quarterly reporting packages.
Providing support to other corporate finance groups and reconciling intercompany relationships and balances.
Performing other duties and tasks as assigned by Lead Senior Accountant or his/her designee.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (or equivalent) in accounting or finance required. Minimum of 0-3 years' experience working within an accounting department (preferably mid-size to large company), and/or in public accounting.
